meanings.definition: A female actor who specializes in tragic roles.
meanings.sent1: The talented tragediennes moved the audience to tears with her performance.
meanings.sent2: The theater was known for its group of skilled tragediennes.
meanings.sent3: The tragediennes accidentally made everyone laugh during the sad scene.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a play written for tragediennes, full of sorrow and heartbreak.
meanings.sent5: The tragediennes portrayed the character's grief so convincingly that it felt real.

meanings.sent1: In the play, there were multiple tragediennes showcasing their talent.
meanings.sent2: The tragediennes received a standing ovation for their powerful performances.
meanings.sent3: The group of tragediennes decided to start a comedy show instead.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with tragediennes, each carrying their own stories of tragedy.
meanings.sent5: The stage was lit up with the presence of the tragediennes, each bringing a unique touch to the performance.
